description: Retrieve the configuration properties of a flywheel iteration. For more information about flywheels, see Flywheel overview in the Amazon Comprehend Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: FlywheelIterationProperties
nested_items.description: The configuration properties of a flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation start time of the flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The completion time of this flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A description of the status of the flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: EvaluatedModelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the evaluated model associated with this flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: EvaluatedModelMetrics
nested_items.description: The evaluation metrics associated with the evaluated model.

nested_items.name: AverageF1Score
nested_items.description: The average F1 score from the evaluation metrics.

nested_items.name: AveragePrecision
nested_items.description: Average precision metric for the model.

nested_items.name: AverageRecall
nested_items.description: Average recall metric for the model.

nested_items.name: AverageAccuracy
nested_items.description: Average accuracy metric for the model.

nested_items.name: TrainedModelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the trained model associated with this flywheel iteration.

nested_items.name: TrainedModelMetrics
nested_items.description: The metrics associated with the trained model.

nested_items.name: AverageF1Score
nested_items.description: The average F1 score from the evaluation metrics.

nested_items.name: AveragePrecision
nested_items.description: Average precision metric for the model.

nested_items.name: AverageRecall
nested_items.description: Average recall metric for the model.

nested_items.name: AverageAccuracy
nested_items.description: Average accuracy metric for the model.
